description: Exciting writing in English is coming from South Asia: India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Sri Lanka.
An area shaped greatly by British colonization, South Asia is changing rapidly now with
globalization.  Students explore this area's history, culture, and religion by reading literature
that tells compelling stories about individuals and groups that seem far different and far away from
21st-century Minnesota.  Prerequisite: FYW.  Offered alternate years.
